description: Pre-made vegan meatballs make this fiery and hearty Moroccan style stew really quick to make.
name: Moroccan Style Vegan Meatballs Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 cloves garlic, peeled and minced, divided
1 medium onion, peeled and diced, divided
2 cups vegetable stock, hot, made with 1 stock cube

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the meatballs, stirring often, for 5 minutes until browned all over.

Add the onion and garlic to the pan and cook for 3-4 minutes. Stir in the harissa, pour over the stock and chopped tomatoes and add the chickpeas and dried apricots. Simmer for 15 minutes and serve with fresh coriander on top.
